name: like_nft
attributes: # [doc = " NFT に「いいね」を記録します。"]
# [doc = " - `user` は AccountInfo<'info> のままで署名チェックを行いません。"]
body: let data = & mut ctx . accounts . like_data ;
data . last_liker = * ctx . accounts . user . key ;

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 手数料支払い用（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " いいねを行うユーザー（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: like_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT ごとのいいね情報を保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , seeds = [b"like" , nft_mint . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , space = 8 + 8 + 32)]

fields.name: last_liker
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 最後にいいねをしたユーザー"]
